channel.title: Small list of stuff needed help with ;)
channel.description:
1. i wanna know how to make a message thing that goes off as a yell example... [server]: register on forums and vote everyday at (website) every so so minutes. tut or comment/pm help :)
2. client(s) i have my own client (coded a lot of it) i'd like to know how to add a custom backround i've seen custom backrounds and then the image s a png photo with the files but i've never figured out how to make a custom backround. tut or comment/pm help :)
3. for adding global objects do i just add in frames.java? or do i need to add in objectoptions/(other object files).java tut or comment/pm help :)
4. in the teleports in the commands it has p.teleportTo(absX, absY, height, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?); the place where the "?" are, what do those mean? tut or comment/pm help :)
5. (last one) how do i add/remove items in a shop ? tut or comment/pm help :)
FYI ALL THESE THINGS I NEED HELP WITH ARE FOR A 508 BULBY SOURCE! (just incase you thought i ment something else ;P)
TY :) tut or comment/pm help :) for all

item.title: Small list of stuff needed help with ;)
item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15
item.description:
@nickog15 wrote:

  1. get a control panal for your server

  2. When you open your client, go search around the files for the pic. Sometimes i use acid blitz client and i just go to acid file store. When you find the pic REMEMBER THE NAME OF IT, like mine is named acid_pic. Then delete it and put your pic in there but SAVE IT AS PNG! rename it also to what your clients old picture was like i would change mine back to Acid_Pic

  3. To add global objects go to client.java on your source. Search (ctrl + f) makeglobalobject, then keep on doing it till you see stuff like this,

makeGlobalObject(3220, 3434, 2213, 0, 10);
makeGlobalObject(3220, 3435, 2213, 0, 10);

make a new one and do:

make globalobject(x, y, object id, face of object (0,1,2,3,4), 10);

  1. I dont know but dont worry about it.
  2. im still having promblems with that also, but i bet you it is in eather:
    ShopHandler.class
    ShopHandler.java
    or
    shops.GFG

Hope i helped

out of breath <---- LOL

Read full topic
item.source: Small list of stuff needed help with ;)

item.title: Small list of stuff needed help with ;)
item.dc:creator: @elascape elascape
item.description:
@elascape wrote:

Insert Quote 3.

to add a global object on a 317 server you need:
-client.java
-coordinates x and y
-id of the object

go into client.java and do ctrl + f or edit then find
search up makelobalobject
make a new line
ex: makeglobalobject(xcoords, ycoords, way its facing, 10);

sorry but i mean 508 bulby source not 317 =\

Read full topic
